channel.title: Últimas Noticias de Fórmula 1 -RSS-
channel.description: Descubre las últimas noticias, actualizaciones y análisis sobre el mundo de la Fórmula 1, incluyendo resultados de carreras, fichajes y más.

item.title: Racing Bulls announce technical team changes ahead of 2025 F1 season
item.description: Racing Bulls have announced that their Technical Director, Jody Egginton, will be leaving the team after more than 10 years as part of the operation.
item.author: Daniel M.R

item.title: Hulkenberg praises 'fast as hell' rookie team mate Bortoleto as he assesses Kick Sauber's pre-season
item.description: Nico Hulkenberg has shared some words of praise for new team mate Gabriel Bortoleto following pre-season testing, with the German stating that the rookie is “fast as hell” as they begin working together at Kick Sauber.
item.author: Daniel M.R
